title: How to Look Like Trump’s Third Wife Using Her Half-Off Skincare Line and Knock-Off Jewelry
text: Melania Trump ’s facewash line has been banished to the discount bin, as her would-be empire turns into an also-ran. It was a Trump empire that could have been. When Melania Trump—model, designer, and wife to Donald —debuted her jewelry line
